 Exactly! This seems like my school only one persons willing to stand 
up for me or even come within 20 feet of me of he can enjoy it. Are 
you Ian Howard,and if you are please don't kill me for giving away 
your name. I'd like to go with the Alliance,but I can't without 
permission so for now it's just going to have to stay a mystery.

chanted

you have

like
